languages.text:
While the Overseer is present in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area, non-Xenos allies in that area receive {uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} bonus to Resolve.
All Xenos, Psyker, and Daemon enemies in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area receive {uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from all sources.

traits.locale_text:
While the Overseer is present in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area, non-Xenos allies in that area receive {uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} bonus to Resolve.
All Xenos, Psyker, and Daemon enemies in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area receive {uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from all sources.

languages.text:
While the Overseer is in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the non-xenos allies in that area gain +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

traits.locale_text:

All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

languages.text:
Пока надзиратель находится в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники в этой области получают +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Все ксеносы, демоны и псайкеры в этой области получают на {uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% больше урона из любого источника.

While the Overseer is in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the non-xenos allies in that area gain +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

languages.text:
監督者がサーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内にいる間、その範囲内の非ゼノの味方が +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を得る。
その範囲内のゼノ、デーモン、異能者ーは、受けるダメージが +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}%増加する。
languages.original_text:
While the Overseer is in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the non-xenos allies in that area gain +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

traits.locale_text:
監督者がサーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内にいる間、その範囲内の非ゼノの味方が +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を得る。
その範囲内のゼノ、デーモン、異能者ーは、受けるダメージが +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}%増加する。

languages.text:
Tant que le surveillant se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, les alliés hors xénos dans la zone gagnent un bonus de +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g}.
Tous les xénos, démons et psykers dans la zone subissent +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} % de dégâts supplémentaires, quelle qu'en soit la source
languages.original_text:
While the Overseer is in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the non-xenos allies in that area gain +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

languages.text:
Mientras el supervisor esté en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos, los aliados no xenos en el radio ganan +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
Todos los xenos, daemons y psíquicos en el área sufren un +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} % de daño adicional de cualquier origen.
languages.original_text:
While the Overseer is in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the non-xenos allies in that area gain +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
当监察官与伺服头骨集群距离不超过4格时，距离伺服头骨集群4格内的所有非异形盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}点。
此外，此区域内所有异形、恶魔、灵能者从所有途径承受的伤害提高{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}%。
languages.original_text:
While the Overseer is in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the non-xenos allies in that area gain +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
All xenos, daemons, and psykers in that area suffer +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}% more damage from any source.

traits.locale_text:
当监察官与伺服头骨集群距离不超过4格时，距离伺服头骨集群4格内的所有非异形盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}点。
此外，此区域内所有异形、恶魔、灵能者从所有途径承受的伤害提高{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1}%。

languages.text:
Befindet sich der Aufseher in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm, erhalten Verbündete in diesem Bereich (Xenos ausgenommen) +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Alle Xenos, Dämonen und Psioniker in diesem Bereich erleiden +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} % mehr Schaden aus allen Quellen.
languages.original_text:

Alle Xenos, Dämonen und Psioniker in diesem Bereich erleiden +{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} % mehr Schaden aus allen Quellen.

languages.text:
Gözetmen, hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeyken o alandaki zeno olmayan dost birimler, +{uip|ResolveBonus|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanır.
Alandaki tüm zeno, iblis ve ruhsezerler; her türlü kaynaktan +%{uip|DamageModifier|e5265e74557c4069b8312921f4c640b1} daha fazla hasara maruz kalır.
